General.Name: Revival Gold Inc
General.Description: Revival Gold Inc. operates as a gold mineral exploration and development company in Canada. It holds 100% interest in the Beartrack-Arnett Gold Project located in Lemhi County, Idaho; and 51% interest in the Diamond Mountain Phosphate Project located in Uintah County, Utah. The company was formerly known as Strata Minerals Inc. and changed its name to Revival Gold Inc. in July 2017. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 145 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 1J8
